name: Suck 'Em Dry!
description:
On your home planet of Eeliks, BUSINESS IS BOOMING!

You are an elite soldier who has been selected to participate in the new "Intergalactic Resource Relocation Program", or I.R.R.P. for short. The aim of this initiative is to peacefully relocate resources from other, primitive, planets who don't need them as much as Eeliks! Your assigned planet is Earth, which is unfortunately inhabited by a pesky species known as "Humans". But worry not, with a little persuasion they will be sure to comply!

This game was created over the course of a week (June 20th, 2022 to July 3rd, 2022)  for a private Game Jam with the theme: "Wait, are we the bad guys!?"

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

MOUSE - Aim

LEFT MOUSE - Shoot

E - Harvest resources

CREDITS:

Everything in this game, except the text font, has been created from scratch by me, Ludvig Burud.

MORE UPDATES COMING SOON!

(Hopefully???)
